overview:
Ms. Lewis brings her marketing and communications savvy to Vertex Venture Capital. She was previously an Account Executive for high tech companies at an international marketing consulting and public relations firm in Israel. She acquired vast marketing and business experience at 3M Europe’s Corporate Marketing and Communications Department and gained exposure to emerging technologies through her work at Organization and Technology Research N.V. in Belgium.

Sharon Lewis holds a D.E.C. in Commerce from Marianopolis College, Montreal, Canada, earned a B.A. in Political Science and International Relations from the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Israel and completed her M.Sc. in Management from Boston University, Belgium.
